title: "Riot did good with Shaco, at least he won't be toxic anymore"
body:
Even when the design team does dumb work on champs, they still manage to convince this board that they did good

lul

replies.body: We have people on both ends of the argument. I wouldn't say the boards as a whole are convinced.
what you don't know is that the poeple supporting the rework know that the rework sucks, but support it because they hate shaco and want the champ to disappear

Can confirm. I'm not being discrete about that. Shaco isn't healthy and his invisibility and flash help him pubstomp at low elo.

He needs an entire VGU. Honestly I think he needs it before Irelia (who is scheduled for this year) but I hope he's early 2018.
if we reworked everyone who could stomp bronze riot would never be done
Low ELO means jackshit. He pubstomps low ELO because people in low ELO are trash. He is (was) perfectly healthy.

And people only get better by playing at low elo and choosing to continue playing. Dealing with pub stompers helps ensure the future of League. It's not like there's any benefit to a champion pub stomping. 

Shaco will be healthy once he gets a full rework. Until then let him sit in the trash can.

Or people can just learn how to play against said damn pubstomper while in said ELO?
He is (was) perfectly healthy already.

They have no reason to learn if he's sucking the fun out and making them quit the game entirely.

That's what constant invasions at low elo do. They make you stop jungling altogether. Because this is a **game**. It's supposed to be **fun**.
If they don't want to learn how to play against a champion, they shouldn't play League.
Say that on a Yasuo hate thread. :P
